sentence: the only thing amazing about this shirt is that anyone actually buys the bs that this is 100% cotton‚Äî it‚Äôs absolutely not‚Äî it‚Äôs that horrible wicking fiber junk‚Äî those shirts are wonderful the first time you put them on, hey i used to fall for them too
very comfortable on the first few outings‚Äî
but then as they wear the plastic that they are made out of starts to make itself known and no matter how much you wash it if you sweat it in the smell is never coming out
they also run big‚Äîi bought a large
and i returned it
and this was big enough for a guy carrying an extra 80lbs
i‚Äôm 5‚Äô10‚Äù 180lbs‚Äî i‚Äôd go with a m if you‚Äôre the same size and you don‚Äôt mind these fake man made material shirts
the best option is high quality cotton shirts ‚Äî light weave
there are several out there, banana republic has one‚Äî they also have the bad micro fiber shirts so beware
it‚Äôs also shameful that they list this as 100% cotton when it‚Äôs clearly not
this shirt is made of a wonderfully soft, silky cotton
but it has a large cloth tag in the neck that can't be removed
it's very securely glued to the cloth
and is very stiff and itchy
in addition, two shoulder seams that join the collar are sewn with some synthetic material that also itches
weirdly, i bought a second shirt from calvin klein at the same time
different color
and it has two neck tags, sewn in, which i was able to remove without damage to the shirt, and the shoulder seams are not annoying
i guess their quality control stinks, and they haven't cught up to the rest of the world in placing printed neck tags in their shirts
i thought everybody was doing that
i wouldn't buy these shirts again, and i'll have to be assured that the neck tags are printed in any shirt i buy from now on
really nice material
much nicer than expected
ck logo is small and really not noticeable
got this to wear on casual date nights and summer evening and have been getting lots of compliments
